item.title: About
item.description: I am scientific software developer living in beautiful Boulder, Colorado USA. I am passionate about the application of computing technology to science and math. I am currently employed at the Unidata Program Center and have been part of the UCAR organization 1 since 1999 when I started here as a student. I specialize in scientific data, metadata, analysis and visualization using a variety of programming languages and technologies.

item.title: Migrating Blog to Hugo
item.description: Revamping this site. More to come hopefully.
